Text: I gotta share a room with your uncle.
Thanks to Shantae, we get an all-expenses paid vacation!
Remember, when you get on stage...
...you’d better do whatever it takes to pacify those genie-crazed throngs!
Make a good impression so we get a free trip again next year.
Now hurry up and meet your fellow performers!
Let them know that the show is starting soon!
There are <1>FIVE HALF-GENIES</1> on this island, so you’d better find them fast.
The Mayor was looking for you. You should go and talk to him, pronto.
This way to the world famous <1>SUNKEN CITY TOUR</1>!
If you are with a tour group, please stick together and watch your step!
(seriously, you might not survive the fall)
Mind the playful bugs and bats who call this place their home!
I think this might be my first real vacation, Uncle!
And it’s sure to be a memorable one!
This island has a rich history.
It sits atop an ancient <1>SUNKEN CITY</1>...
...much of which is still intact today.
Places like this are all tourist traps.
They find a spot with historical significance...
...and laugh all the way to the bank.
I've always wanted to see these old ruins.
Now that Shantae's a big celebrity, I'll finally have my chance!
You promised not to embarrass me!
My foot’s still asleep from carrying all the bags!
I’ll take Bolo to secure our lodging.
Catch up when you're finished gawking at the scenery.
I won't let anything ruin my first vacation!
Oof, these old bones need a rest.
Welcome to the World Famous Undersea Tour!
Please come back after you've <1>SAVED YOUR PROGRESS</1>!
Welcome to <1>ARENA TOWN</1>, home of the Half-Genie Festival!
All Half-Genie guests must check in with the Mayor upon arrival!
Thank you, and have a festive stay!
Please watch your step when exiting the resort area.
This island is home to many hostile monsters!
Thank you, and have a festive stay!
This area is off limits for now.
All the way from Scuttle Town!
You can call me the Mayor!
It is my greatest pleasure to host this event...
I created the festival to demonstrate my appreciation of rare, magical beings like yourself.
I want people from all over the world to witness the magic firsthand!
That way they can better understand their half-human, half-genie neighbors!
This beautiful island makes a dandy backdrop for the event!
Hello! And you must be Shantae's uncle!
Why yes, we have managed to muster quite a crowd!
Of course most of the ticket money goes to support local businesses...
...and provides a free flight and hotel stay for each of our Half-Genie super stars!
...they agree to be the <1>STARS</1> in my <1>GRAND PERFORMANCE</1>...
That's why I want you up on that stage for the sneak-peek preview event - tonight!
I don't even know the routine yet.
It's just a dry run after all!
You know, a practice performance in front of a live audience!
Something to work the kinks out!
I've invited <1>FIVE</1> other Half-Genies to perform with you!
They're here on the island now.
And remind them about tonight's big show?
I can't wait to meet them!
Find the <1>FIVE</1> other Half-Genies for the Mayor!
Items like that <1>CHECKLIST</1> can be found on your <1>SUBSCREEN</1>.
If you ever forget what to do, open the <1>SUBSCREEN</1> and browse through your items for hints.
For now, please introduce yourself to <1>ALL FIVE HALF-GENIES</1> on the island!
The show’s about to start! The others are already backstage! Please hurry!
I definitely sense something odd in this place.
I came to this island to perform in the festival.
But since meeting Vera, my Half-Genie senses keep going nuts.
Well... I'd better head back to Arena Town.
Make sure you meet the other Half-Genies!
You’ve met all the <1>HALF-GENIES</1>? The show is starting soon. You’d better report back to the mayor!
Are you one of the Half-Genies...?
My town is right here on the island!
With all the tourists around, my people tend to keep hidden away.
But I wanted to support my fellow Half-Genies and put my <1>REFRESH</1> magic to good use.
Who knew there were so many different forms of magic?
You'll get to see them all in tonight's big show!
It was very nice to meet you!
Be certain to introduce yourself to the other Half-Genies!
You’ve met all the <1>HALF-GENIES</1>? The show is starting soon. You’d better report back to the mayor!
I flew in all the way from Scuttle Town!
So what do you think of this island?
I'm half tempted to plug into one of these terminals.
See if the power lines run back to some rich guy's mansion or something.
Like a key to a locked door?
Gosh, I never even thought of that...
Then what, like a muscly superhero or a fire-breathing dragon or something?
Um, usually I turn into a monkey and climb around.
That’s not what I would choose.
Ok, well don’t be late for the performance.
Make sure you meet the other Half-Genies!
You’ve met all the <1>HALF-GENIES</1>? The show is starting soon. You’d better report back to the mayor!
Shantae! It’s so nice to finally meet you!
I’m <1>HARMONY</1>, the oldest of the Half-Genies.
Yes, I was the <1>VERY FIRST</1> to be born of a human father and a genie mother.
You look too young to be the oldest anything!
Half-Genies haven't been around all that long!
We exist as a generation of one!
So unless the Genies return someday...
...there won't be any more Half-Genies to follow after us, will there?
Gosh! I never thought of that.
...We must do our <1>VERY BEST</1> to make a difference in this world, don't you think?
We can talk more after the show.
Just remember to always give it your best, ok?
I didn't say it was, I’m just asking.
Why, is there such a thing?
Heh. Better go find all the other Half-Genies, like me!
Better go find all the other Half-Genies, like me!
The others are already backstage! Please hurry!
The show’s about to start! The others are already backstage! Please hurry!
You haven't saved your game yet!
Please come talk to me after you've saved.
This is supposed to be a practice show!
Why are the stands so packed?!
Half-Genie magic is what you're best at.
It's what these people came to see.
I'd better <1>REPORT BACK TO THE MAYOR</1>!
You're worried that I'll disappear too, is that it?
Can you imagine what it’s like being the only one left behind?
I can’t hide indoors and do nothing!
Those girls are not coming back.
Something weird is happening on this island!
And I'm going to find out what it is!
And I'm going to get one!
And don't get me started about Uncle and Sky!
Even Bolo is on their side!
How can I just lie low while the Mayor looks into this?
I may not be the <1>GUARDIAN GENIE</1> of this island...
I don’t care what anyone says!
Girls don't just vanish in full view of an entire audience!
...And I'm going to get to the <1>VERY BOTTOM</1> of it!
What are you doing down here?
I might ask you the same question!
You're staying out of trouble, I hope?
Well, I figured since we're stuck here for a while...
Why not enjoy the Sunken City tour?
Yessir, I’d sure like to see the rest of this place.
It’s a shame that so much of it is sealed off!
But I suppose safety must come first, after all.
The tour guide said that removing even a <1>SINGLE STONE BLOCK</1> could be enough to cause a cave in.
With the entire town, right above us!
Now what is all this now?
Ooof, I think I bruised my bum.
Uncle can you hear me up there?
I must be in an older part of the Sunken City!
Even deeper down than the tour!
Risky must've used these tunnels to spirit the Half-Genies away!
I’d better search high and low for clues!
The Half-Genie runt! Fancy meeting you here!
I know what you did, Risky!
You'd better release those girls, or else!
You just have all the answers, don't you?
You won't live long enough to interfere with my plans!
If you want to know who <1>REALLY</1> captured those girls...
You won't have to look very far.
How did you get down here?
I’ll get you out of there!
It will allow you to <1>TRANSFORM INSTANTLY</1> into a new form!
This one bears the mark of a <1>DASH NEWT</1>!
Dash Newts are rare creatures that inhabit the island.
Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!
I promise to do my very best!
If you <1>DASH INTO A WALL</1>, you can stick to it!
Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to <1>DASH</1>! If you <1>DASH INTO A WALL</1>, you can stick to it! Give it a shot!
Press <IB action=Dash /> to <1>DASH</1>. While dashing, you can even <1>STICK TO WALLS</1>!
Tap the  <I anim=ui_global:ios_button_fusion.anb seq=icon_spark scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to <1>DASH</1>! If you <1>DASH INTO A WALL</1>, you can stick to it! Give it a shot!
The island officials told you to stay safe!
For the last time, stay out of this!
Boy, you sure were right about that <1>NEWT</1> magic!
I never knew I could transform like that!
Harmony says that when we work together, we can do anything!
So what if we <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1>?
Fusion Stones come from right here on the island.
A tiny amount, like what's in that coin, gave you the abilities of a newt.
But if we had an <1>ENTIRE FUSION STONE</1>...
I bet I could give <1>ALL OF MY POWERS</1> to you!
You can't just give your magic away!
We'll merge our magic into one big...
...And you can give the magic back when you're done.
Find a <1>FUSION STONE</1> and meet me in <1>ARENA TOWN</1>.
And remember... if you ever forget where to go next...
I'll be waiting for your answer <1>BACKSTAGE</1>!
Bolo! What are you doing all the way up here?
You and Sky got the room with the pool!
You know what swims in your pool?
You know what swims in the pool over here?
And I'm starting to think it's not even a pool!
The water is thick and smells like mustard!
I went for a dip, and when I got out there was a thing on my foot!
I am a deep sea explorer!
My mission is to study the history of this island with my crew.
Our vessel, the <1>METAL FISH</1>, is a deep sea <1>SUBMERSIBLE</1>.
It's docked near a trench off the island's East side.
I want to learn the <1>SECRET ORIGINS</1> of the Sunken City!
To continue my research, I require <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1>!
One from the high elevation cesspools on the island's <1>WEST SIDE</1>...
And another collected from sea level, ideally from the <1>EAST SIDE</1>.
And before you ask, I do know my East from my West!
If you find <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1>, please bring them to me!
I need <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1> to continue my research!
One from the high elevation cesspools on the island's <1>WEST SIDE</1>...
And another collected from sea level, ideally from the <1>EAST SIDE</1>.
If you find them, bring them!
Oh! You brought me <1>TWO ARTHROPOD LIFE FORMS</1>!
May I have both of them?
Oh phoo! But I need them!
Please return when you have <1>TWO OF THEM</1>!
How could two creatures discovered at wildy different elevations...
It suggests that the island itself has suffered a turbulent past!
Perhaps volcanic activity caused the city to sink!
And as a result, the island was showered by strange rocks...
...which were belched skyward from deep within the belly of the Earth!
You can go ahead and keep that.
Thank you for helping me with my research!
And please pay a visit to the <1>METAL FISH</1> sometime!
Pay a visit to the <1>METAL FISH</1> sometime!
Nothing left in the trashcan but orange peels and gum.
If you happen to see a doctor, show them that <1>THING FROM THE TRASHCAN</1>!
Hope I don't turn into a gigantic, throbbing pustule!
With it, we'll be able to <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1> and save Harmony and the others!
With it, we'll be able to <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1> and save Harmony and the others!
Are you ready to try <1>MERGING OUR MAGIC</1>?
Hold still... It's time to combine our magic!
The <1>SEER DANCE</1> can reveal things that are otherwise invisible to the naked eye!
(Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Left/> to activate the magic!)
(Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)
Why not try testing it in this room?
I'm certain that the <1>SEER DANCE</1> will help you on your quest!
Just remember to try it everywhere!
(While dancing, press  <IB action=Left/> to activate the magic!)
(While dancing, touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)
Why not try testing it in this room?

Just remember to try it everywhere!
(While dancing, press  <IB action=Left/> to activate the magic!)
(While dancing, touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_scan scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)
What are you doing behind the wall?
I've been looking for you ever since you fell from sight!
It might help you find those girls.
There's an opening in the wall here.
Folks have been using them to solve water-themed puzzles for years.
Yeah, I'm here. Just kidding with you.
Uncle, you should go back up to the surface, where it's safe.
But first, you should look through this hole again.
Okay... what am I looking for?
Ha ha, I blew in your eye.
Here, use this to get lunch if you see a place.
That <1>VALVE HANDLE</1> probably operates some mechanism nearby!
Good luck on your <1>QUEST</1>! Find those four missing Half-Genies!
How did you find our village?
She was taken away by those <1>THINGS</1>.
For years, my people have been forced to hide.
They hide inside the ghostly fog...
Forget your troubles for a time.
I will never see my daughter Vera again.
This young lady has proven that she carries <1>TRUE HOPE IN HER HEART</1>!
There is a <1>SPECIAL JOY</1> to be found in her strange, wiggly movements!
A joy that gives us <1>HOPE FOR TOMORROW</1>...
...But most of all it gives us <1>COURAGE TO FACE OUR FEARS</1>!
I must go and tell the others!
I must not mourn my daughter!
I can feel it <1>DEEP IN MY HEART</1>!
Thank you for this gift of <1>HOPE</1>!
It was a gift to me from my own father!
But I believe that <1>YOU</1> will <1>GIVE IT ONE</1>.
Put that <1>USELESS OBJECT</1> to good use!
Maybe try reading its <1>DESCRIPTION</1> on the <1>SUBSCREEN</1>!
I am forever grateful to you for returning my daughter. Thank you!
What in the world is she doing on this island?
If those Arena Town fools won't open this hatch willingly...
No one defies Risky Boots, Queen of the Seven Seas!
Move it before it blows, you fools!
It won't be long before <1>ABSOLUTE POWER</1> belongs to me!
I'd better follow and see what she's up to!
So you weren't behind the abductions after all.
Then it must have been that <1>PLANT THING</1> I saw before.
But what in the world was it? And where are the others?
Are you asking Risky Boots, the <1>QUEEN OF THE SEVEN SEAS</1>...
The true rulers of this island are not the land lubbers up above.
...and <1>THE ONE</1> of whom they will not speak.
If you wish to save your friends...
You'll have to get past me!
I didn't come to this island to capture your friends.
Those Sirens can do whatever they want with them.
What in the world is she talking about?
Hold on. I’ll get you out of there!
Seems like this prison was designed to put you under.
A bit disoriented, but fine otherwise.
Thanks much bunches for coming to my rescue!
It will allow you to <1>TRANSFORM INSTANTLY</1> into a new form!
This one bears the mark of a <1>GASTRO DRILL</1>!
Gastro Drills are burrowing creatures who move through the dirt!
Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!
I promise to do my very best!
Press against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> with <IB action=LSTICK/> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!
Move against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!
Press against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> with <IB action=LSTICK/> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!
Move against a <1>SOFT SURFACE</1> to <1>DRILL</1>! Give it a shot!
I'm sorry! The <1>DANCE PARLOR</1> is closed by order of the <1>CHIEF</1>!
Would you talk to him for us?
There will be time for more dancing later!
For now, please share your <1>HOPE</1> with our <1>CHIEF</1>!
The <1>DANCE PARLOR</1> is open to all!
When the music starts, the <1>TURBULENT HIP-SHAKING</1> begins!
<1>STRIKE A POSE</1> and see if you can hit <1>MASK SHAPED TARGETS</1> up above!
<temp>How many rounds will you play? More rounds, bigger savings!</temp>
You dance in such a weird and wonderful way!
I sense <1>TRUE HOPE IN YOUR HEART</1>!
Tell the <1>CHIEF</1> he must worry no more!
<1>10 GEMS</1> for another round! How 'bout it?
Is there no way to open it?
Shapes on this <1>USELESS OBJECT</1> match the markings on this hatch!
Off to find his own room.
Boy, you were spot on about that <1>DRILL</1> magic!
I never knew I could transform like that!
Harmony says that when we work together, we can do anything!
She's safe, back in Arena Town!
What about Harmony, and the others?
I only wish I had the help of my <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>.
I used to wear it around my neck.
But once while I was swimming...
That was the end of that.
If I had that <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>, I could help you find the others!
If you find it, bring it to me in <1>TREE TOWN</1>.
It's all up to you now! Good luck!
I didn't expect to see other people down here!
I am a scientist from the <1>METAL FISH</1>.
Right now I am testing a theory.
When a mermaid's days come to an end...
Its shells fall to the ocean floor.
Over time, the shells <1>SINK INTO THE SEA BED</1> to become fossils.
Do mermaids wear shells taken from other creatures...
Or are the shells part of a mermaid exoskeleton, there from birth?
I for one believe in the latter!
If you can bring me <1>SIX MERMAID SHELLS</1>...
...I will have the data I need to prove my <1>VERY IMPORTANT THEORY</1>.
You'll find Mermaid Shells in the <1>DEEPEST PART OF THE OCEAN SANDS</1>.
I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!
I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!
Did you bring me <1>SIX</1> of them?
Looks like you're still missing some!
I could tell just by looking at the <1>KEY ITEMS</1> portion of your <1>SUBSCREEN</1>.
But I need them for my research!
At last, I can use this data to test my theory!
These shells came from a <1>SEA COW</1>!
And by the look of it....
All six came from the same cow.
I probably owe you something for your trouble.
Something I found on the ocean floor.
You can keep that <1>LUCKY AMULET</1> for your troubles.
You can keep that <1>LUCKY AMULET</1> for your troubles.
I've been wandering around down here for hours!
There are <1>SIRENS</1> down here, uncle! You need to get to safety right away!
Fine, fine. I can find my way back to <1>ARENA TOWN</1> from here.
I can find my way back to <1>ARENA TOWN</1> from here. You go on ahead.
As you can imagine, my father was overjoyed to see me.
I've honestly never seen him so happy!
Unfortunately there's still no sign of my <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>.
If only I had it back, I could help you rescue the others!
Unfortunately there's still no sign of my <1>LUCKY AMULET</1>.
If only I had it back, I could help you rescue the others!
My amulet was crafted on this island.
With it, we'll be able to <1>COMBINE OUR MAGIC</1> and save Harmony and the others!
The <1>REFRESH DANCE</1> can heal your wounds, but it can also <1>BRING LIFE</1> to others!
(Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Up/> to activate the magic!)
Why not try using it in this room?
(Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_refresh scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)
Why not try using it in this room?
I'm certain that the <1>REFRESH DANCE</1> will keep you healthy!
Be sure to try it on other things as well!
(Dance until you see the icon appear, then press  <IB action=Up/> to activate the magic!)
(Dance until you see the icon appear, then touch <I anim=ui_game:ios_dance_buttons.anb seq=icon_refresh scale=0.5 width=0.7 offsetx=0.35 offsety=0.43> to activate the magic!)
What was that just now my good sir or madame!
I'm so completely awake, I feel like waterskiing on a baby’s bicycle straight to the stars!
How long have the lads and lass been down there?
I’ve got to run the winch and haul them up now!
Do not pass Joe do not collect rent as they say!
Whyn’cha get in there and see if the lads and lass are their right selves...
...or if they’re all waterlogged and jelly-fied limy skeletons?
Hoo boy, I hope they’re fine!
It'll be your fault for not wakin' me up sooner!
Want me to raise the Metal Fish?
Let me know when you’re ready!
The <1>METAL FISH</1> is ready to board!
You've got some explaining to do!
I'll answer one question, and one question only!
What are you really doing on this island?
Did you just come here to find that <1>TREASURE</1>?
That sounded like two questions to me.
Those girls vanishing at the same time you show up...
Like I told you before, I'm here for the <1>TREASURE</1>!
How can you steal an entire city?
I believe that's enough questions for now.
What is that supposed to mean?
I’ll get you out of there!
Hmm. It's another of these bizarre cages!
It will allow you to <1>TRANSFORM INSTANTLY</1> into a new form!
This one bears the mark of a <1>BONKER TORTOISE</1>!
Bonker Tortoises are rare creatures that inhabit this island.
They can’t swim, but they can <1>SMASH STONE</1> and even <1>SPIN</1> on their top spike!
Using its abilities, you may be able to locate the <1>SOURCE OF EVIL</1> in this place!
Press <IB action=Stomp/> in air to <1>STOMP</1> from above!
You can also charge up and release <IB action=Attack/> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>! Give it a shot!
Swipe down on the screen in air to <1>STOMP</1> from above.
You can also charge up and release the <1>(!) button</1> to perform a destructive <1>SPIN DASH</1>! Give it a shot!
Press <IB action=Stomp/> in air to <1>STOMP</1>, or charge up and release <IB action=Attack/> to <1>SPIN DASH</1>!
Swipe down in air to <1>STOMP</1>, or charge up and release to to <1>SPIN DASH</1>
Did we return to the surface already?
Or is my depth gauge busted?
Careful. That thing might still be out there!
I am getting some interesting readings from down below.
An odd blip! Could an undersea power source exist nearby?
There's nothing like the safety of the <1>METAL FISH</1>!
These nice folks are my fellow scientists!
So glad you could join us.
We were just about to take the <1>METAL FISH</1> even deeper!
I have lost my interest in mermaids.
I saw a <1>BROKEN FAN</1> to the <1>WEST</1> of the <1>SUBMARINE DOCK</1>.
Sadly, without <1>NUTS AND BOLTS</1> it will stay broken!
Sensors say he's somewhere in the <1>FLOODED HALLS</1> of the Science Laboratory, on the <1>EAST</1> side!
I'll mark the locations on your <1>MAP</1>!
Our mission is to learn everything we can about the Sunken City!
That the lower levels are cursed...
But we say <1>NO</1> to conventional wisdom!
Let us descend to a place where wisdom is without meaning!
To the very <1>BOTTOM</1> of the food chain!
Want to see what's down there?
Ready to take a ride in the <1>METAL FISH</1>?
Let us know when you’re ready!
Take a deep breath! Metal Fish, going down!
This is it! Welcome to the Sunken City!
Want to return to the surface?
Let us know when you’re ready!
Hang on tight! You’ll soon see blue skies and sunlight!
Are you guys sure this thing is safe?
Of course! There's nothing to worry about!
If we were in any danger at all, the proximity alarm would tell us!
Water is the sailor's best friend!
Stopping by to say hello, that's all!
Merely one of nature's creatures, the bounty of the sea!
THIS IS THE WORST VACATION EVER!
We could electrify the outer hull!
Maybe that will scare the beastie off!
I had a feeling that might do the trick!
I found two of the missing girls already!
Time for me to turn over.
Let me know when you find the others.
I need to find the missing girls, NOW!
Yeah, I am moving out of your way!
But first, I need to show you my idea!
You play as the bold and daring Squid Baron!
Your quest is to find <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1> that are hidden about.
According to the prophecy, you're the only one who can wield the Dagron Balls.
And that's because you bear the mark of the champ on your left hand.
Which hand is my left hand?
You'll find the <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1> trapped inside the statues that I put them in.
Use your powers to wake up the statues.
Come back here when you have found all  <1>THREE DAGRON BALLS</1>!
Will you deliver the <1>DAGRON BALLS</1> unto me?
Now I'd give you a treat or whatever, and you'd get more powerful.
Can I please get back to my rescue mission now?
I'm off to check on my investments.
Wait - you didn't get all of the items!
Whew! I thought he'd never leave!
And no worse for the wear!
Any time you'd like to return to the surface, we'll be here.
Be a dear and check the hull for damage, would you?
For a minute there I thought you couldn't hear me knocking.
That was you banging on the sub?!
